channel.title: retention on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide

item.title: Image Retention
item.description: Image retention is similar to a screen burn or ghosting shown on the display. To refresh the display pixels, press the Power button either on the display for about 3 seconds or the remote control. The display power indicator flashes while the process is in progress. NOTICE Some displays take about 10 minutes to begin the process.
